metadata.synopsis: SH took Selune path in Act 3

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: Must be lovely to have a swim without boiling all the fishes alive.
2.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH has turned from Shar. Previously learned to swim with her lover.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Sounds pleasant to swim with you. At a distance. It's usually so freezing.
0.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH has turned from Shar. Previously learned to swim with her lover.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Don't ask me to make a hot spring for you two. It might work. But I also might cook you like lobsters.
